name: android
description: This framework is based in WebdriverIO and Appium with Mocha compiler, it works to run HD and LW app for Android

scripts.challenges: eslint ./HD/ --fix && wdio run ./config/wdioHD.conf.js --spec=./HD/test/Challenges.test.js && allure generate _results_/allure-raw/ --clean && allure open
scripts.homecoming: eslint ./HD/ --fix && wdio run ./config/wdioHD.conf.js --spec=./HD/test/Homecoming.test.js && allure generate _results_/allure-raw/ --clean && allure open
scripts.lamotta: eslint ./HD/ --fix && wdio run ./config/wdioHD.conf.js --spec=./HD/test/LaMotta.test.js && allure generate _results_/allure-raw/ --clean && allure open
scripts.login: eslint ./HD/ --fix && wdio run ./config/wdioHD.conf.js --spec=./HD/test/Login.test.js && allure generate _results_/allure-raw/ --clean && allure open
scripts.more: eslint ./HD/ --fix && wdio run ./config/wdioHD.conf.js --spec=./HD/test/More.test.js && allure generate _results_/allure-raw/ --clean && allure open
scripts.navigation: eslint ./HD/ --fix && wdio run ./config/wdioHD.conf.js --spec=./HD/test/Navigation.test.js && allure generate _results_/allure-raw/ --clean && allure open
scripts.onboarding: eslint ./HD/ --fix && wdio run ./config/wdioHD.conf.js --spec=./HD/test/Onboarding.test.js && allure generate _results_/allure-raw/ --clean && allure open
scripts.preferences: eslint ./HD/ --fix && wdio run ./config/wdioHD.conf.js --spec=./HD/test/Preferences.test.js && allure generate _results_/allure-raw/ --clean && allure open
scripts.profile: eslint ./HD/ --fix && wdio run ./config/wdioHD.conf.js --spec=./HD/test/Profile.test.js && allure generate _results_/allure-raw/ --clean && allure open
scripts.rides: eslint ./HD/ --fix && wdio run ./config/wdioHD.conf.js --spec=./HD/test/Rides.test.js && allure generate _results_/allure-raw/ --clean && allure open
scripts.roadmap: eslint ./HD/ --fix && wdio run ./config/wdioHD.conf.js --spec=./HD/test/Roadmap.test.js && allure generate _results_/allure-raw/ --clean && allure open
scripts.today: eslint ./HD/ --fix && wdio run ./config/wdioHD.conf.js --spec=./HD/test/Today.test.js && allure generate _results_/allure-raw/ --clean && allure open
scripts.clean_e2eHD: rimraf _results_/* && eslint ./HD/ --fix && wdio run ./config/wdioHD.conf.js && allure generate _results_/allure-raw/ --clean && allure open
scripts.clean_e2eHDBS: rimraf _BSresults_/* && eslint ./HD/ --fix && wdio run ./config/wdioHDBrowserStack.conf.js && allure generate _results_/allure-raw/ --clean && allure open
scripts.e2eHD: eslint ./HD/ --fix && wdio run ./config/wdioHD.conf.js && allure generate _results_/allure-raw/ --clean && allure open
scripts.e2eHDBS: eslint ./HD/ --fix && wdio run ./config/wdioHDBrowserStack.conf.js && allure generate _results_/allure-raw/ --clean && allure open

author: miguel.hm@wizeline.com // miguel.mora@harley-davidson.com
